settings.title: Alpa Raiyani
settings.text: It was fabulous! Especially the way you explain every craft and piece. Each piece is unique in its own way. The craftsmanship, the quality of the stones, and the way you handle everything traditionally‚Äîyou are restoring our antique art; that is the whole¬†beauty¬†of¬†it.

settings.text: I am totally in love with the Mayura Necklace. Thank you so much. üòä

settings.title: Sulochana Puri
settings.text: The lovely Sulochana in our classic Kadambari Necklace, crafted in gold with uncut diamonds/polki and emerald drops.

settings.title: Chavi Tandon
settings.text: With an eye for detailing and perfection in their craft, Aurus is making beautiful jewelry pieces, some of which I proudly treasure. Their team is extremely efficient and patient in helping long-distance clients like me to choose just the perfect pieces that are truly a reflection of our personality.

settings.title: Sujana Sridharan
settings.text: Absolutely loved my Deccani Navratna Neckalce and how well it went with my outfit! ‚ù§Ô∏è

settings.title: Ayushi Agnihotri
settings.text: I wore the Poulomi Earrings at my function! My family made the purchase, but I fell in love with the earrings! ‚ù§Ô∏è

settings.title: Siddhi Rathi
settings.text: I got this beautiful piece from you for my Mehendi function, and I LOVED IT! Thank you again. I cannot wait to shop more from your collection! I live in the US, so I was unable to come to your store in Ahmedabad to physically see and try the jewelry. I fell in love with it just by looking at the pictures so one of my relatives video-called from your store, and we just bought it. I wanted this exact set, and it perfectly matched my entire look! ‚ô•Ô∏è

settings.title: Tanisha Bhatt
settings.text: The lovely bride Tanisha in her custom-made Aurus designs for her wedding.

settings.title: Poorna Nayak
settings.text: I love jewelry that has a good design, looks beautiful, and has been made artfully. As they say, ‚ÄúA thing of beauty is a joy forever.‚Äù Now, I own such a piece and love the detailing and fine work. Also, online requires a lot of transparency, and I like that all your materials are displayed on the website. I never knew what a glass-filled ruby was, but if that's what is used, it's mentioned.

settings.title: Jaina Lalbhai
settings.text: The gorgeous Jaina glowing in our beautifully handcrafted Jaisalmeri necklace.

settings.title: Malvika Mehta
settings.text: I ABSOLUTELY love it! It is stunning. I loved wearing the pieces, and so many people asked me about it. I can‚Äôt wait to get more stuff from you. üíñ

settings.title: Shikha Saxena
settings.text: Sikha's lovely daughter in her Aurus favorites, beautifully paired with her outfit for Diwali!

settings.title: Nipa Patel
settings.text: The graceful Nipa wearing our Kaveri Choker Necklace and Amodini Earrings for her wedding, crafted using uncut diamonds/polki and pearls with hints of pink.

settings.title: Kanha Bakeri
settings.text: The lovely Kanha in her custom-made diamond and emerald jewelry for her engagement, beautifully paired with pristine whites.

settings.title: Alankrita Rao
settings.text: Seen on Alankrita, our Nitya Jaisalmeri Necklace‚Äîa one-of-a-kind handcrafted neckpiece embellished with uncut diamonds.

settings.title: Janki Patel
settings.text: After following Aurus and Moi on social media for a while, it became very clear to me that there was something special here. In an online world with so many choices often leading to confusion, I was keen on finding the right designer and craftsmanship that suited me and my personality. I quickly realized Aurus was the one for me and made it a point to visit the studio during my Ahmedabad visit recently. After meeting the team and the owner-designer herself along with her husband, it was obvious that jewelry was their extreme passion and not just a commercial business. The creativity, quality, and energy were quite evident within just a few minutes of our meeting. I liked every piece that the team showed me, and it became difficult to choose. Aurus and Moi blend the modern with traditional styles, bringing forward timeless classics with a contemporary feel, that can be enjoyed by women of all ages and generations.

settings.title: Amina Saeed
settings.text: I have a deep connection and love for traditional stuff, and I appreciate intricate, thoughtful pieces. When it comes to jewelry, there are many options in Dubai, but I find it quite hard to like something of my interest. I saw an image of one of your jewelry pieces on Instagram, and it intrigued me to look your brand up in detail. I appreciate the NAFASAT of the work done and decided to reach out to you. Puja has done a wonderful job designing the pieces.

settings.title: Ambika Sandur
settings.text: The lovely Ambika in our Jaisalmeri necklace, a one-of-a-kind handcrafted neckpiece embellished with uncut diamonds, effortlessly styled with a gorgeous pastel green organza saree.

settings.title: Neha Sharma
settings.text: Taking a moment to appreciate and revel in the heritage, craft, and textiles of our country, like the double ikat silk and beautiful handcrafted Haydari neckpiece I'm wearing.

settings.title: Urvi Hadaliya
settings.text: Added one more to my collection from Aurus, and it is just amazing! I adore all your pieces and getting them one by one. I already have some and am looking forward to many more. You guys are the go-to solution for my jewelry shopping!

settings.title: Vineeta Garg
settings.text: I came across AURUS sometime during COVID and started following them. I was literally in love with their designs. In fact, I messaged them and asked if they ever came for exhibitions in Lucknow. But at that time, they were not doing so. And I thought that if ever I went to Ahmedabad, then I would buy from them. But luckily, they hosted the Aurus Trunk show right before Diwali this year. I went with my sister-in-law, thinking of buying a pair of earrings to go with one of my vintage neckpieces. But I fell in love with the Ratna Necklace; I absolutely adored it. I bought it and placed an order for a matching set of earrings. I wanted Jhumkas specifically. They made the earrings and sent them to me; they were absolutely beautiful! They really know their craft. The Jhumkas look so stunning, gorgeous, and magnificent‚ÄîI don't know what to say, but it's one of my favorite sets. I've worn it a couple of times since I got it, and I've got so many compliments! I'm looking forward to buying more stuff from them. And I would recommend Aurus to everyone.

settings.title: Virushi Shah
settings.text: The pretty Virushi, a one-of-a-kind- necklace embellished with polki and a cluster of various colored gemstones.

settings.title: Soumya Sunil
settings.text: The lovely Soumya in our Mayura Necklace on her wedding anniversary!

settings.title: Vinita Bhatt
settings.text: The lovely bride Tanisha with her mum Vinita. Both wearing their Aurus for Tanisha's wedding!

settings.title: Mala Kesari
settings.text: The sweetest Mala was accompanied by her husband and her sister, who planned a trip to Ahmedabad, to visit us, all the way from Delhi. Her husband goes on to say, "Our daughter told us about Aurus, and demanded we visit you in Ahmedabad and we had the best experience at your store".

settings.title: Mansi Prajapati
settings.text: Seen on Mansi, our Kumud Gold Baalis, a one-of-a-kind handcrafted earrings finished with rubies and pearls.

settings.title: Garima Satija
settings.text: For me Aurus was all about the detailing they have done in their designs. The historical pieces they have reinvented for our generation to wear, that is what caught my attention about Aurus.

settings.title: Shubha Rajeev
settings.text: Received the Pihu Necklace today and got struck by the beauty and craftsmanship of design. It felt like I am holding a dream in my hands, I wonder how will I be able to wear this jewel. Thank you so much for this!

settings.text: I was searching for something on Pinterest and I stumbled upon the Kalgi Earrings, I then visited your website and all the designs were beautiful - I was amazed to see how each design is handcrafted to finesse. It became my dream to own an Aurus design, and I bought the Kalgi Earrings. Whenever I go for any functions I wear it and people ask me about it. It is now my favourite amongst all my jewellery.

I don't like wearing jewelry that had usual emeralds and rubies what caught my attention was the different colour stones you guys worked with. Your website, your marketing, your communication with me gave me confidence. I love it! üíñ

settings.title: Bani Bains
settings.text: Hi I‚Äôm Bani, I love the intricacies of each piece I own - and how it brings my face to life! I feel happy, confident, and most importantly, like myself even though everyone expected me to be a ‚Äòbride‚Äô. I also read the reviews and how your jewelry looks on normal people!

settings.title: Mukul Khajanchi
settings.text: I was myself quite shocked that I made this purchase virtually.. I wanted something stunning to wear and get made as a memory for my brother‚Äôs wedding; and I wanted it to be a combination of diamonds, rubies, emeralds & pearls; what caught my attention was the beautiful design on Instagram.. I just couldn't find any such beautiful design elsewhere. Speaking over the video call, looking through some of your other designs, the craftsmanship, and attention to detail instilled confidence in me. The whole process was seamless, including the payment and delivery. Once I received the necklace and earrings, I was even more mesmerized about how beautiful it turned out in reality. I feel like a queen wearing it, have already received so many compliments and I am hoping this will be a heirloom piece my next generations will be able to cherish as well!

settings.title: Evanka Thimmaiah

The ring finally made its way to me as a present from my husband, and it was beautiful. I feel loved when I wear your jewelry.

settings.text: Jewelry, to me, is a very personal space. Some collectible pieces are very grand and are for select occasions, and I think one of my daughters will get this.

settings.text: @shraddhakapoor How gorgeous are the pieces from Aurus!üòç Really amazing!

settings.text: The Haydari Necklace from AURUS (isn‚Äôt the name beautiful)‚Äîagain from a brand I love, not just for what they make, but also the people behind the brand. So, I tell you: it‚Äôs always the people, the feelings, the impression they leave on you, and the overall experience that is much more precious and valuable rather than the actual product.

settings.title: Roshni Parikh
settings.text: The gorgeous Roshni in our Aar Choker Necklace, embellished with a star-shaped uncut diamonds/polki motif on a bed of pearls with scattered tourmalines, and finished with ‚Äúchaand‚Äù elements and gemstone beads.

settings.title: Virajini Ghate
settings.text: I've been a working professional for a long time in the rather boring and serious profession of banking, yet, I am very interested in Art, and that includes beautiful jewelry and patterns, colors, and designs, which is what attracted me to Aurus. The designs are a combination of colors and patterns, and most importantly, they are contemporary, yet traditional. The best part about Aurus is the transparency which I like very much, and the ease of purchasing online.

settings.title: Divya Datla
settings.text: Finally received my jewelry, and all the items look exactly as pictured. Thank you so much!

settings.title: Poornima Rajendran
settings.text: A young mom to a hyper daughter, an image consultant, an entrepreneur and a nature enthusiast. As a woman, I am challenged in all aspects of life & taking life with a positive mindset helps me progress & grow. The design & craftsmanship that go into making fine jewelry are what matter the most. I have come across various pearl choker designs from different brands, but once I saw your post on social media, I realized it was a unique design that caught my attention. Well, this is the first time I am buying a piece of jewelry online, and I gained the confidence by looking at the Instagram follower base and the quick and genuine response to my queries. Sales and post-sales services were excellent. I feel elegant and confident when I wear this piece. I have tried multiple styles around this jewelry, and I must say, it's a show stopper.

settings.title: Smita Ithape
settings.text: Yet again, your creativity, support, packaging & shipping has exceeded my expectations. Loved the necklace and Emerald bracelet; I'm very pleased with the elegant femininity and timeless classic design. As Diwali is around the corner, your jewelry is already filling my heart with excitement. Aurus is a very trustworthy brand. I'm looking forward to buy more.

settings.title: Sripriya Ponnapalli
settings.text: It‚Äôs beautiful, and I love the metal box it was packaged in too. I discovered you through Instagram. Love the aesthetic and timelessness of your pieces. As an Indian living abroad, shopping online brings me access to many things I wouldn‚Äôt normally have. Thanks again!

settings.text: The elegant Suhitha in one of our Indus Revival Necklaces.

settings.title: Prasanna Bhaskar
settings.text: Thanks for the lovely piece. It is just what I hoped it to be. Reminds me of these little jewelry trinkets I would find in my grandmother's trunk. The studs which have lost the screw, and the pendant that doesn‚Äôt have a chain. And I always wanted to bring them all altogether in one piece that brought back her memories. Unfortunately, my grandma passed and the trinkets went many ways. This piece reminds me of what it could have been. Was so well-packed. Thank you for making this happen. I can make your signature piece MY OWN.

settings.title: Archana Vonipenti
settings.text: I am an Instagram addict and follow a lot of Indian fashion brands, and I liked some of the jewelry I saw in your account and started following since last year. I do not wear much jewelry, but as years went by, I realized I gravitated towards timeless and classic pieces. So even if I have few, I make sure what I buy is something I can pass down for years. And hence my love for diamonds, pearls, and precious stones. Since I followed you on Instagram for a year, I knew it was a genuine company. I also noticed you were featured in Vogue India. To be honest, I was scared to order online, but I took the chance, and it worked out. I love the choker and got a ton of compliments already, so enjoying it a lot right now.

settings.title: Vandana Berjis Desai
settings.text: I am so glad I found you! I have been wearing the Ariya necklace and all the other jewels I bought from you, and love them! Always a pleasure to see what you all are up to.

settings.title: Nisha Kundnani
settings.text: Luxury is a feeling, unrushed. The new idiom: Make it small but significant. The meaning of true luxury is not about how much we own; it's about how well we live. To live well, we need certainty and assurance, and that comes with owning less meaningful products. This a true testament to that idea of discreet luxury and beauty in Indian jewelry made timeless with an edge of refinement. The beauty of Aurus jewelry is that it's so wearable. You may buy around the wedding, but it fits the ideology that you don't need special occasions to wear jewelry.

settings.title: Sharanya RajanSan
settings.text: Seen on Sharanya: our one-of-a-kind necklace and earrings, featuring a stunning silhouette set with an elaborate center bordered with brilliant-cut diamonds.

settings.title: Arpana Parikh Patel
settings.text: Seen on Arpana: our emerald tassel necklace, crafted in gold and skillfully studded with diamond and emerald detailing.

settings.title: Divya Patel
settings.text: Seen on Divya: our statement Kaliganthi Necklace is handcrafted in gold, featuring uncut diamonds/polki with ruby and pearl elements, and matched perfectly with a classic pair of our gold jhumkas.

settings.title: Charanya Ramkumar
settings.text: I follow several blogs on Instagram, and that is how I found Aurus. I looked at the page and found several pieces that were unique and never seen before. I fell in love with a pair of diamond danglers, a style that I had been looking for, and the price seemed reasonable as well. I was very apprehensive about ordering something online from India since I am in the US, but I still took a chance and placed an order. It was very impressive that Aurus quoted me a price including taxes etc. upfront, so there were no hidden fees. I have also reached out to several big jewelry companies in India, and none of them have been as easy to deal with or as responsive as Aurus. My order was on my doorstep within the time promised, and the process was seamless, to say the least. I am already a repeat customer since I have just ordered another unique piece from them and will be glad to pass these heirloom pieces on to my daughter. Thank you for a wonderful experience, Aurus!
